attributes.title: Stock Take
attributes.description: Summary of stock take findings;
attributes.recommendation:
• Controls to manage stock items should be strengthened to caution the company against any possible loss resulting from control gaps in stocks especially on finished products and raw materials.
  • Deductions should be effected on the responsible staff members where stocks shortfalls are noted.
attributes.effect: The company may incur financial losses as a result of stock variances.

value:
·        In prior audit Bread stock showed a surplus of +42 Loaves

·        White flour had a deficit of -5.15 kg,

·        Packing material had  a surplus of +332 pieces,

·        Yeast showed a shortfall of -3.09 sachets,

·        Utto experienced a variance of -1.36 units while White Ingredient had a minimal Variation
Current
The physical stock counted, Bread had a -2556 loaves, Utto had -0.642 Ltrs white flour had -9.367 kgs, and poly bags had +2916 pcs. The rest of the stock items had minimal variances
Stock controls in place need to be strengthened.
Operations/Production Department
To establish whether the physical stocks were matching with the stock book balance generated from SAP system and whether internal controls on stocks were effective.

attributes.title: Bread weight
attributes.description: Bread weight summary;

value: In prior audit, Bread underweight were, 4Barrel – 50%, 600g – 7%, 6barrel – 14%, 800g – 9% and 8barrel – 64%.
Current
From the samples picked, bread underweight were noted as follows; 400g - 5%, 600g - 0%, while 800g had 12%.
Bread weight controls should always be adhered to.
Operations/Production Department
To safeguard the company reputation in the market and also caution against fines & penalties

attributes.title: Damages Analysis
attributes.description: Analyzing actual production damages & Market damages with the actual production and actual sales respectively for the sample period. Acceptable rate is at most 0.2% and 0.5% respectively.
attributes.recommendation: Damages should be maintained at the set threshold to caution the company against losses resulting from excess damages.
attributes.effect: Production damages recorded for the period exceeded the set threshold exposing the company to risk of losing cash.

value: The higher production damage was recorded from 9th Feb production after the power outage.
The high production damages noted resulted from power interruptions on 9th Feb 2025.
In the prior audit, the production damages were 0.38% of the total production and had a cost implication of Kshs.63,132.59
Current
In the current audit, it was noted that production damages were averaging at 0.70% of the production and market damages stood at 0.40% of the total sales.
The branch should work on strict quality controls to manage production damages.
Operations/Production Department
Reduce losses associated with high bread damages.

attributes.title: Cash Transactions
attributes.description: There exist cash transactions in the branch
attributes.recommendation: The branch should embrace cashless transaction to minimize the risks associated with cash handling.

value: We still have customers who operate on cash basis
No previous finding.
Cash verification is done to verify cash held by the cashier and whether cash controls are in place to safeguard cash held at the branch.
Proper controls are in place to safeguard cash held at the branches.
Operations/Production Department
Minimize risks associated with handling physical cash.

attributes.title: Production efficiency
attributes.description: Computed production efficiency.
attributes.recommendation: Ensure production workers are properly manage to achieve the set production level.

value: To ensure that production cost aligns with the budgeted costs.

attributes.title: Computed Packing efficiency
attributes.recommendation: Improve on packing efficiency to the set standard of 97 crates per slicer.

value: Ensure that company production costs aligns with the budgeted costs

attributes.title: Machine breakdown
attributes.description: There were cases of rampant machine breakdown particularly ovens.
attributes.recommendation: KAF technicians should give proper assessment of faulty ovens and remedy thereof.

value: Rampant breakdown of oven with no permanent solution from KAF technicians. The response time at night is too long
Provide preventive maintenance to curb breakdown.
